item.title: SK Hynix Investment Outlook for the New Year 2026
item.description: SK Hynix started the new year strong, hitting an all-time high on the first trading day of 2026. With forecasts of HBM4 mass production and a surge in commodity DRAM prices leading to operating profits exceeding 100 trillion won, is now the right time to buy? Mew, Kurumi, and Mikael fiercely debate SK Hynix’s 2026 investment strategy with data, passion, and cool-headed analysis.

item.title: After a Discouraging 2025, Will Altcoins Rebound in 2026?
item.description: After a year-long Bitcoin rally and altcoin stagnation in 2025, investor fatigue is at an all-time high. Will the long-awaited ‘alt season’ finally arrive in 2026? We conduct an in-depth analysis of the altcoin market’s survival prospects and selective rebound scenarios, based on major token unlock issues, the regulatory environment, and the flow of institutional capital.
